languages.text: "О, лишь однажды. И это было ужасно! Казалось, огромный синий купол над головой вот-вот разобьется и упадет на меня, а гравитация переломает все косточки..." {n}Вигдис передергивает плечами, отгоняя нахлынувшие воспоминания.{/n} "Корабль — мой дом родной, Лорд-капитан. И я не променяю его на блага даже сотни миров".

traits.locale_text: "О, лишь однажды. И это было ужасно! Казалось, огромный синий купол над головой вот-вот разобьется и упадет на меня, а гравитация переломает все косточки..." {n}Вигдис передергивает плечами, отгоняя нахлынувшие воспоминания.{/n} "Корабль — мой дом родной, Лорд-капитан. И я не променяю его на блага даже сотни миров".

languages.text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."
languages.original_text: "О, лишь однажды. И это было ужасно! Казалось, огромный синий купол над головой вот-вот разобьется и упадет на меня, а гравитация переломает все косточки..." {n}Вигдис передергивает плечами, отгоняя нахлынувшие воспоминания.{/n} "Корабль — мой дом родной, Лорд-капитан. И я не променяю его на блага даже сотни миров".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! I felt the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, with gravity crushing my bones..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The vessel is my home, Lord Captain. And I will not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

"Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

"Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

languages.text: «Una vez. ¡Fue horrible! Sentía como si esa inmensa cúpula azul que tenía encima fuese a romperse y caer en cualquier momento, y la gravedad parecía querer aplastar mis huesos...» {n}Vigdis sacude los hombros, como si quisiera quitarse la carga de esos recuerdos de encima.{/n} «Mi lugar está en la nave, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, y no cambiaría eso ni por el botín de cien mundos».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez. ¡Fue horrible! Sentía como si esa inmensa cúpula azul que tenía encima fuese a romperse y caer en cualquier momento, y la gravedad parecía querer aplastar mis huesos...» {n}Vigdis sacude los hombros, como si quisiera quitarse la carga de esos recuerdos de encima.{/n} «Mi lugar está en la nave, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, y no cambiaría eso ni por el botín de cien mundos».

languages.text: “噢，我曾经离开过一次，那简直是太可怕了！头顶上巨大的蓝色穹顶，好像随时都会掉下来，而且重力简直要把我的骨头压碎了……”{n}维格迪斯的肩膀抽动着，努力挡住汹涌而来的记忆。{/n}“这艘船就是我的家，舰长大人。哪怕拿一百个世界来和我换，我都不换。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我曾经离开过一次，那简直是太可怕了！头顶上巨大的蓝色穹顶，好像随时都会掉下来，而且重力简直要把我的骨头压碎了……”{n}维格迪斯的肩膀抽动着，努力挡住汹涌而来的记忆。{/n}“这艘船就是我的家，舰长大人。哪怕拿一百个世界来和我换，我都不换。”

languages.text: 「えぇ、一度だけ。それはそれは大変でした！頭上の大きな青いドームが今にもバラバラと落ちてきて、骨が重力で押しつぶされそうな感覚でした…」{n}ヴィグディスは肩を震わせて、押し寄せる記憶を吹き飛ばそうとしている。{/n}「船は我が家です、ロード・キャプテン。惑星を100個積まれたって手放したりしませんよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「えぇ、一度だけ。それはそれは大変でした！頭上の大きな青いドームが今にもバラバラと落ちてきて、骨が重力で押しつぶされそうな感覚でした…」{n}ヴィグディスは肩を震わせて、押し寄せる記憶を吹き飛ばそうとしている。{/n}「船は我が家です、ロード・キャプテン。惑星を100個積まれたって手放したりしませんよ」

languages.text: "Ja, einmal. Und es war furchtbar! Ich hatte das Gefühl, diese riesige blaue Kuppel über mir könnte jeden Augenblick zerspringen und herabstürzen, und dass die Schwerkraft meine Knochen zerschmettern würde ..." {n}Vigdis versucht, mit den Schultern die Flut der Erinnerungen abzuschütteln.{/n} "Das Schiff ist mein Zuhause, Lord Captain. Und ich würde es nicht gegen hundert Welten eintauschen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, einmal. Und es war furchtbar! Ich hatte das Gefühl, diese riesige blaue Kuppel über mir könnte jeden Augenblick zerspringen und herabstürzen, und dass die Schwerkraft meine Knochen zerschmettern würde ..." {n}Vigdis versucht, mit den Schultern die Flut der Erinnerungen abzuschütteln.{/n} "Das Schiff ist mein Zuhause, Lord Captain. Und ich würde es nicht gegen hundert Welten eintauschen."

languages.text: « Une seule fois, et ça a été affreux ! J'avais l'impression que l'immense dôme bleu au-dessus de nous risquait de se briser à tout moment et que la gravité allait me briser les os... » {n}Vigdis secoue ses épaules, comme pour chasser les souvenirs qui lui reviennent.{/n} « Ma place est à bord de ce vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je ne l'échangerais pas contre les merveilles de centaines de mondes. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Une seule fois, et ça a été affreux ! J'avais l'impression que l'immense dôme bleu au-dessus de nous risquait de se briser à tout moment et que la gravité allait me briser les os... » {n}Vigdis secoue ses épaules, comme pour chasser les souvenirs qui lui reviennent.{/n} « Ma place est à bord de ce vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je ne l'échangerais pas contre les merveilles de centaines de mondes. »

languages.text: "Bir kerecik. Dehşet vericiydi! Üzerimdeki dev mavi kubbe her an çatlayıp çöküverecekmiş, yer çekimi yüzünden de kemiklerim kırılacakmış gibi hissetmiştim." {n}Vigdis, kötü anıları kovarmışçasına omuzlarını seğirtiyor.{/n} "Bu gemi benim evim Lord Kaptan. Yüz dünya dolusu hazine bile verseler değişmem."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I did once. And it was dreadful! It felt like the massive blue dome overhead could shatter at any moment and fall, and my bones would be crushed by the gravity..." {n}Vigdis twitches her shoulders, trying to ward off the flood of memories.{/n} "The ship is my home, Lord Captain. And I would not trade it even for the bounty of a hundred worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde ve dehşet vericiydi! Üzerimdeki dev mavi kubbe her an çatlayıp çöküverecekmiş, kemiklerim de yerçekimi yüzünden kırılacakmış gibi hissetmiştim." {n}Vigdis kötü anıları kovarmışcasına omuzlarını seğirtiyor.{/n} "Bu gemi benim evim Lord Kaptan. Yüz dünya dolusu hazine bile verseler değişmem."
